snippet: The Devils re-signed Marek Zidlicky, which will allow the team to keep its top defensive pair together.
abstract: New Jersey Devils re-sign defenseman Marek Zidlicky; detail of Zidlicky's new contract are not revealed.
lead_paragraph: The Devils re-signed Marek Zidlicky, which will allow the team to keep its top defensive pair together.

headline.main: Devils Keep Zidlicky, Defenseman in Top Pair
